name: @stream.boffosocko.com/profile/chrisaldrich awesome! Can't wait to see your Read plugin :) Both Watching and Read should potentially integrate with my Reviews plugin, too!

content.html: @stream.boffosocko.com/profile/chrisaldrich awesome! Can't wait to see your Read plugin :) Both Watching and Read should potentially integrate with my Reviews plugin, too!
content.value: @stream.boffosocko.com/profile/chrisaldrich awesome! Can't wait to see your Read plugin :) Both Watching and Read should potentially integrate with my Reviews plugin, too!

summary:
I'm debating whether it's better to do a standalone plugin for read or just add it as a PR to the "like/bookmark/repost" set up in core since they're all so similar. I suspect they'd prefer it be separate from a corporate standpoint, but it could be much easier and cleaner that way.
I noticed the product mf2 on Watches, and meant to suggest putting a star rating set up on those posts too. I imagine you could cut and paste some code from your reviews plugin?
